name: FunniBaddle 3D Demo
description:
FunniBaddle is the story of Kyle the Dinosaur, a dinosaur who wants to help out in life. The princess of the Gorjj castle in the Malafares was kidnapped by an unknown dino. Kyle wants to help the princess out and save her!

Super Mario 64 was a huge inspiration for the Kyle game. It was made with inspiration from it. We mean a lot of inspiration.

FunniBaddle features many enemies like Ootshrooms and Turtlees. And of course it features many more.

There are 4 excellent levels of this game, each one designed carefully for players and gamers to have lots of fun and enjoyment.

The game has 4 levels which are: Dookanex Battlegrounds, King K. R. Reddy and Whitaket, Mona L'Art, and the last and final level which is Toven's Abandoned Castle.

You can get the game app for free on computers. It's very entertaining, believe us!
